alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 10:32PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern York and east central Hamilton Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1032 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Utica to near Benedict to near Marquette. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... York, Hampton, Bradshaw, Waco, Benedict, Gresham and Thayer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
